Description:
Stately Victorian Residence Circa 1873
-4 huge bedrooms, study, parents retreat, ensuite, loft bedroom & 2 magnificent formal living rooms.
-High ornate ceilings and wide passages.
-Renovated with love and top quality fittings & workmanship.
-Open fire places, some with stunning marble mantles.
-Fantastic kitchen/dining room open onto side veranda and central family room.
-Outdoor pavilion in stunning landscaped garden, featuring Serpentine garden.
-Land 5,560m2 approx.
-Original granite entrance steps.
-Three street frontages with generous parking in shed.
-Huge cellar, above ground pool and ducted evaporative cooling.
-A unique home which has an interesting history and ownership.
Please contact to arrange your private inspection of this wonderful home so we can point out hidden treasures.
Insights: 25 Morrison Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017 and 5 other 5 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Retire in style.
If you are looking to downsize and enjoy the "rest" of your lives, this lovely two-bedroom villa located in the Aviva Communities Retirement Village, Kangaroo Flat offers very affordable, independent living for over 55s.
The villa features two bedrooms with robes and ceiling fans, spacious open lounge, dining and kitchen area with a raked ceiling adding to the sense of space.
The kitchen includes gas cooking appliances, dishwasher and big island bench/breakfast bar separating it from the roomy dining area while fuss-free split system heating/cooling complemented by a ceiling fan keeps it cosy or cool year-round. Good-sized bathroom, separate toilet and laundry with external access to the carport, garden shed and private alfresco area.
Set in lovely garden surrounds, village residents enjoy a relaxed, low maintenance lifestyle amid like-minded neighbours with the added benefit of community facilities like CCTV security, community centre incorporating lounge, kitchen, library, meeting room, gym, cinema, indoor/outdoor bowling, workshop/woodworking room and has a place to store the boat or caravan between trips.
It's a short walk to Lansell Square shopping centre with public transport at the front and walking tracks nearby for active types. Call for a guided tour today.
Insights: 20 other 2 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
STUNNING SKYLINE SUNSETS
An absolute pivotal position on the hill crest this fantastic home with family entertainment in mind; will have you absolutely speechless with nothing left to want for…
A spacious and light filled 30sqs of fully landscaped and meticulously designed floorplan highlights the two living and entertaining areas and separate parents' wing. The generous master bedroom effortlessly flows through the walk through his and hers robe to the double ensuite. Front lounge which seconds as the parents retreat has a cosy ambience to it. Sitting opposite the wide front entry foyer.
Onto the Kitchen, boasting stainless steel appliances and spectacular smokey mirrored glass splashback with reflects the outdoor alfresco area and hidden sunsets. Stone benchtops, 900mm cooktop range and plentiful storage options overlooking the meals area. Surrounded by windows and specifically designed for morning sunlight… this property offers it all.
Another three bedrooms with built in robes and direct access to a family bathroom and separate toilet. This area services children or guests alike.
The stunning outdoor area has to be seen to be believed… With skyward views and lush garden surrounds. Enough room for family, friends or pets to play and enjoy on nearly 800m2.
Additional extras as expected from a home of this caliber include: Double auto garage. 5kw solar power & solar boosted HWS. Evaporative cooling and gas ducted heating. Ceiling fans in all bedrooms. Walk in linen closet. Large laundry, Double gate side access & fully fenced yard for pets.
Just a short drive to the local Centro Lansell Shopping complex and a 10 Minute drive into the CBD. Its quiet location is perfect for you to access the Calder Highway and either commute or enjoy an easy trip to Melbourne. Local schools and public transport close by. A home that will surprise and excite you.
Insights: 20 Sundew Drive, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
A REAL SURPRISE PACKAGE.
Located close to the train station, schools, public transport, walking tracks, lake and all the shopping that Kangaroo Flat has to offer.
This well maintained home will be sure to impress. If you are looking for a fantastic first home, young family home or something solid to downsize into, this is a must see.
Boasting 3 bedrooms, the generous main has a walk in robe and ensuite. Remaining rooms all with built in robes.
With the addition of a study that has private screened accordion doors, it can easily become a nursery, sewing room or a separate play room for the kids.
The central living room is light bright and open with tasteful pillars separating it from the tiled kitchen/ living /dining area.
The kitchen has a great amount of storage and bench space, with gas cooktop, electric oven and a great cavity for a fridge.
The modern Bathroom consists of a full size bath, shower and vanity.
Wall heater and split system cover your heating and cooling needs.
Tasteful colour tones throughout.
Off the kitchen leading outside is a huge paved solid steel undercover area. Perfect for all types of entertaining. This area also has direct access from the 2 car garage with electric roller door, ensuring that you are covered all year round.
The addition of some well-established palms really bring this yard to life. The fake turf helps with the low maintenance and looks fantastic. A separate fenced off area is perfect as a dog yard and also has a convenient 6 x 3 colourbond garden Shed.
Call for your personal inspection today.
Insights: 26 Grevillea Avenue, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Big Shed, Big Block, Tradies Dream!
A beautiful unique family home with 2 living areas and another that could be used as a games room, bedroom, study or library.
Canadian ski lodge inspired, the home has timber cathedral ceilings, timber cabinetry in the kitchen and a rare Huon timber staircase to the second level.
Near new stainless steel appliances in the kitchen, new floor coverings and recently painted this home feels almost new.
The main bedroom has his and hers BIR's and an ensuite, the remaining bedrooms have BIR's too.
The floor plan is interesting and yet works well to accommodate family living.
The allotment is approx 1041 m2 and
is very low maintenance.
Ideal for a trades person the property offers ample shedding, all with concrete and power (3 phase too). Vehicle access to the backyard and farmland over the back fence
does away with any feelings of claustrophobia and
yet the property is conveniently located close to shops, child care, schools, medical facilities and public transport. Call us now to make a time to inspect before its too late.
Insights: 106 Lockwood Road, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
A BIG SURPRISE INSIDE!
Located a stones throw from Forest Lake and neighbouring the natural forest setting of Bendigo Regional Park is this affordable family home that proves looks can be deceiving! Perched on the high side of the road, don't be fooled by a first glance from the curb! You won't expect a deceptively big family sized abode behind the attractive façade, meaning an inspection is a must to fully appreciate what lies beyond
Inside the home, the spacious floor plan offers a family flexibility and independence, whilst parts have been updated to reflect up to date trends. Boasting plenty of accommodation, up to five bedrooms (or four plus a home office/study) can cater for a large family, whilst the master suite at the front features walk in robe and ensuite. The main bathroom and two separate his and hers toilets (a quirky feature) are conveniently located in the kids wing of the home. Living space is in abundance thanks to the tiled open plan family room at the front and the enormous family room at the rear. This fabulous room is so spacious and has enough flexibility that it will house your couches and tv, kids toys and a pool table – all separately but at once! The sizeable central kitchen overlooks the dining and family area, and is in fantastic order for now until its time to update down the track! There is plenty of cupboard and bench space available, and the dining area is conveniently close and generous in size. Temperature control is provided thanks to ducted heated and cooling, whilst other features include excellent storage capabilities, and double auto garage at the front
A fully established and manageable 686m2 block is all set up and ready to enjoy immediately. If you love outdoor entertaining, then you will be delighted with what's on offer here! Entertain your family and friends all year round under the fabulous alfresco area, and enjoy countless BBQ's on those balmy summer nights.
A fantastic value for money family home that provides a big surprise inside. Close to bush walking tracks, transport, schools and a short distance to Lansell Square shopping centre, this flexible property will provide you with everything your family needs!
Insights: 59 Queen Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Presented To Delight
Step inside to discover what a comfortable home this one is.
- Four great bedrooms, or one could be used as a second living area.
- Full ensuite and separate family bathroom with bath.
- Ducted cooling throughout.
- Kitchen with gas cook top and electric oven and pantry.
- Dining area off the kitchen opens up directly to outdoor covered patio and fernery which is a delightful shady spot in the summer to sit with a coffee.
- The rear garden is securely fenced and has a water tank feeding the garden.
- Garden shed and access through from the double carport to the rear garden. Plenty of room for a caravan.
This is a lovely property that would be suitable for retirees looking for space and comfort, very close to shopping and public transport.

Description:
A Great Property at a Good Price
A picture perfect property that must be inspected to be fully appreciated. This is a one owner property from the day it was built & has been meticulously maintained & updated throughout that time.
Step inside & you are immediately welcomed by the formal lounge area that opens through double glass doors to the smart updated kitchen/dining room that features
loads of bench & cupboard space & gas cooking. Flowing through from the kitchen/dining room you find yourself in the spacious & very welcoming second living/family room that overlooks the private rear yard & sheltered outdoor area. Three good size bedrooms all with built in robes. A smart 3 piece bathroom, separate toilet & spacious laundry.
Year round comfort is assured with gas heating in both living areas & a large split system air conditioner also. Outside we find an immaculate low maintenance block with a secure back yard. A double length garage workshop with concrete floor & power, plus an adjoining carport .
The home is very low maintenance property on a very manageable allotment in the heart of Kangaroo Flat. A most desirable & comfortable family home suitable for both investors & home buyers alike. Expected Rental return would be in the area of
$280 to $300 per week. An inspection will impress.

Description:
The Perfect Downsizer!
If your seeking a hassle free, low maintenance lifestyle then this is the perfect place for you. Sitting pretty opposite a nature filled reserve is this well kept townhouse featuring 2 bedrooms, Master with WIR and 2nd bedroom with BIR, two way bathroom, 2 toilets, open plan living area with an abundance of cupboard space, gas cooktop & electric oven. The spacious living/dining area is saturated in natural light and overlooks an undercover rear deck that is perfect for relaxing in all year round. Description:
PRIVATE POCKET in KANGAROO FLAT
At the end of a quiet court bowl rests this North facing, solid, well built four bedroom property. Upon entry you have the bedroom wing to the right. Offering two bathrooms and a good sized master with large built in robes and a picture window filtering copious amounts of natural light. Family bathroom with spa bath and all the other features you would expect.
Towards the heart of the home you will certainly be surprised by the size of the open plan kitchen meals and lounge. Beyond generous in proportions; it makes for a special bright light filled space. New floor coverings and recent updates provide you with a sense of security, privacy and neighbourhood community which is immediately noticeable in this pocket in Kangaroo Flat.
Throughout; features refrigerative cooling and gas ducted heating plus the ambience of a solid fuel heater in the large lounge. The U shaped kitchen with cork tiles allows for families or those to entertain in a great space. Single garage and workshop bench provide benefits for those handy on the tools or as a great storage area. 2.5kw of solar cuts down on the energy bills as a huge plus. Under house storage is also a must mention.
The garden surrounds have been landscaped for ease of use and low maintenance. A quaint little front paved sunny tiled patio gives you an extra outdoor sitting area. Inspection is a must.

Description:
NEAT FAMILY HOME WITH HUGE SHED!!
Located in a very quiet pocket of Kangaroo Flat is this neat three-bedroom brick veneer home, in very good order throughout and with the added bonus of a large shed, the property is ideal for first home buyers, singles, couples, families, downsizers or investors.
The floor plan consists of three carpeted bedrooms, all with built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom with separate toilet nearby for your convenience. The kitchen features a good amount of cupboards and bench space, breakfast bar, electric wall oven, gas cook top, dishwasher and corner pantry. Adjacent is the dining area which is large enough to accommodate a family size table and provides access to the outdoor entertainment area through a glass sliding door. The separate carpeted lounge is a generous size and is a great place to relax with family. Gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling control the comfort levels.
Externally is a paved and roofed outdoor alfresco/entertaining area which is a great place for a BBQ or to share a few drinks with family and friends. For those needing a shed, your needs are well and truly catered for here with a 6m x 9m colorbond shed, perfect for a man cave or to store extra vehicles, plus there is a 6m x 7.5m attached carport. A single carport with auto door provides further car accommodation beside the house and access to the rear yard. Low maintenance gardens, a 2000 litre water tank and secure fencing are some other external features.
With schools, transport, shops and sporting facilities nearby and an easy 10-minute commute to the CBD of Bendigo, the location is outstanding. An excellent family home or easy-care investment property. Call today for an inspection.

Description:
SUBURBAN FAMILY VALUE!
Located in a quiet, handy suburban location is this neatly presented, stylish modern home ready for you to live in and love immediately! As good as brand new, exceptional value is assured, and you would be mad not to consider your options here! Take the time and stress out of finding land, then building and establishing your own version of what is already here!
The spacious floor plan offers flexible and comfortable living. Whether you are a first home buyer, young family, downsizer, or retiree, this home will suit a diverse range of quality home seekers. Consisting of three generous bedrooms plus large study, or four bedrooms – the choice is yours on how to configure. The master suite has full ensuite and walk in robe, whilst the main bathroom services the rest of the home. At the front is a spacious lounge, with the generous main living area at the rear of the home forming part of the open plan kitchen meals and living zone. The well equipped kitchen has all the mod cons, and is complete with ample cupboard and bench space and all stainless appliances. Ducted heating and cooling controls comfort levels to all parts of the home. A double garage has auto door and direct internal access.
Outside, a spacious family sized allotment measures approx 903m2. There is room for kids and pets to play on the generous lawn area, with the alfresco area and garden still having room for your ideas. There is loads of room to build a big shed if required, and handy vehicle access at the side to store a caravan, bot or trailer.
The price tag is affordable and presents terrific value for money! Handy to the Kangaroo Flat shops, Lansell Square shopping centre and schools, there are many reasons why you should book an inspection today!

Description:
Existing to please
Affordable, established, spacious and conveniently situated, this property embodies all the reasons why there's no need to build anew. An unimpeded line of sight from front door to rear boundary further instils the sense of space that is immediately apparent upon entry. On opposite sides of the kitchen-meals area, the 2 living zones can be separated from each other simply by closing a hallway door, a family harmony enhancer so often not included in new builds these days. Owning a walk-in pantry, plus a long island breakfast bar thoughtfully equipped with power points, the kitchen is perfectly positioned to host a party. Stainless steel appliances include a new dishwasher, and there will be no need to worry whether your fridge will fit with the consideration given to that thought here. Possessing dimensions demanding status as a true parental retreat, the substantial master bedroom reserves an ideal position for a chaise or cosy sofa within a bay window. Twin vanity and a 1200mm shower plus a walk-in robe complete this serene scene. Double door built-in robes belong to 2 more big bedrooms that sit either side of a study nook and family bathroom with spa. To manage local weather extremes, gas heating and evaporative cooling are ducted throughout the home. However, expenses on utilities will be minimised by the 4kw solar panels, as well as a 2000 litre rainwater tank that is connected to the toilets. Mostly giving the chilly southerly weather the cold shoulder of brickwork, the residence optimises a north-easterly aspect with large windows capturing winter sunlight, also saving energy on heating. Glass sliding doors link the family room with an undercover alfresco area that adjoins extensive paving. Established landscaping encompasses retaining walls, mulched areas, veggie patches, shrubs, plus ground covers and there's a garden shed to stow the mower. Alongside the double garage that has direct entry indoors, side gates allow secure off-street parking of a trailer, boat or caravan in the well-fenced backyard. Commuters will appreciate less than a 10 minute cycle to the train station and central Bendigo is 7 kilometres from this address. Four doors from a bus stop, it's also close to a community health centre, schools, shopping, services and sporting facilities. Forest Lake is only 200 metres away and Bendigo Regional Park not much more. A wonderful opportunity to start new traditions of family bushwalks and picnics, or a regular routine of escaping for some quiet time and a brisk walk, the location is terrific too.

Description:
THE ULTIMATE FAMILY PROPERTY
Your family will love the surrounds of this meticulously presented executive family residence. No expense has been spared on the construction of this outstanding property. Offering quality fixtures & fittings, space and massive amounts of storage options with all the sought after features you would expect in a home of this calibre. The family will love the resort like lifestyle with features such as a fully floodlit tennis court, a huge in-ground solar heated pool and an alfresco/entertaining area, all looking over the natural bushland that borders the rear of the property. The home is massive and measures approximately 34 squares and sits on a block that is just over half an acre with a very private and peaceful outlook.
Upon entering the home through double doors into the wide grand entrance foyer, you know you are in for something special. With multiple living zones, the family has several choices. There is a large kitchen/dining/living area, a dedicated state of the art theatre/lounge room with surround sound speakers wired for your listening pleasure, plus a third lounge which could be used as a rumpus room or parents retreat. With five carpeted bedrooms or four and a study, the master suite comes complete with walk in robe, ensuite with oversized shower, feature tiling, vanity, heat lamps for the cooler months and a separate toilet. The other 4 bedrooms are of a good size, all with built in robes and ceiling fans. A beautifully tiled 3 piece bathroom with luxurious spa bath, services the rest of the home. The kitchen is exceptionally well appointed and will please the family chef, with Caesar Stone bench tops, a 4-metre-long island bench with breakfast bar, stainless steel 900mm freestanding gas/electric oven and cook top, rangehood, new dishwasher, heaps of pot drawers & a large walk in pantry that provides lots of storage. The meals area is adjacent which is large enough for a generous sized dining table with access to the alfresco/entertaining area provided by glass sliding doors. Other internal features are ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling to control the temperature, laundry with a fantastic walk in storage room and more internal storage space at the rear of the 2 car garage with auto door and internal access. here is also a 20 panel solar system to help keep energy costs down.
Outside is an entertainer's paradise. The alfresco area with built in BBQ and pizza oven is a delightful place to entertain your family & guests at your next gathering and looks over the fully flood lit synthetic grass tennis court and the sparkling 11m x 5m in ground salt chlorinated, solar heated, self-cleaning pool. Other external features are a vegie garden, water tank with a pump that is plumbed to the toilets, a 2m x 3m garden shed plus a massive 15m x 4m colorbond shed with auto roller for extra parking or storage space for a caravan, trailer or boat.
Luxury living at its best, with local wildlife including kangaroos and echidnas at the back fence, shopping centre and the CBD of Bendigo a short drive away, you have the ultimate lifestyle property. Call today to organize an inspection to truly appreciate this magnificent property.

Description:
Neat as a pin
Located in a well sort after Cul De Sac known as Eden Court in Kangaroo Flat, this two bedroom townhouse won't be on the market for long. Perfectly maintained, the home features two large bedrooms, one with built in robes and the other with a large walk in robe that leads to the three piece bathroom that has dual access and a separate toilet.  The lounge room is very spacious with a large window overlooking the front garden, a gas wall furnace and air conditioner. The kitchen has plenty of bench and cupboard space, as well as a double stainless steel sink, dishwasher, gas stove and electric oven. The dining area opens up to the undercover alfresco area that runs the length of the home, perfect for entertaining, the alfresco is lined with multiple shrubs for protection from the weather. Also in the courtyard is a paved garden shed, but the real bonus is the additional multipurpose room adjoining the secure garage with auto roller door ( a site plan can be found on this website or emailed through on request ). With the benefit of reasonable owners corporate rates of only $45 per quarter and the community feel, you wont be able to go past this gem so call our friendly sales team to inspect today.
